author: Wang, JP
adress: Shanxi Prov Peoples Hosp, Dept Gastroenterol, Taiyuan, Shanxi, Peoples R China
title: Cerebellar Fastigial Nucleus Stimulation in a Chronic Unpredictable Mild Stress Rat Model Reduces Post-Stroke Depression by Suppressing Brain Inflammation via the microRNA-29c/TNFRSF1A Signaling Pathway
